nodes.bodyText:
As I understand things, this is the same as the difference between implementation and api ...which is to say, with api:
Functionally:  every project that has this project as a dependency, automatically receives that dependency on it's implementation path.
Design wise: whenever a class from a dependency is in the signature of a public method of this project (a library method, to be used by others), that dependency should be an api, as any project using this as a dependency is going to also need that class/dependency (at least at runtime, if not also compile time)
Does that make sense?
